title: Plenary Session: Interregional Cooperation on OER

author: Koutheair Khribi, Arab League Education, Culture and Scientific Organization (ALECSO)

segmentation: First of all, I'd like to take this opportunity.
To introduce the Alexa organization you know, Alexa stands for Arab League, educational, cultural and scientific organization.
It's a governmental organization working under the umbrella of the Arab League.
It has the membership of 22 Arab countries, so it's somehow the Arab world equivalent of UNESCO organization and Electro is endeavoring to conduct and coordinate a pen Arabian.
Projects related mainly to the area of education, culture, and science and ICT fields.
So listen, gentlemen, there is no doubt that the extremely rapid growth of ICT many concepts you know have emerged specially the last decade.
We speak about, for example, mobile technologies, cloud computing, Internet of Things, big data, etc.
So all of these concepts have opened up new opportunities for innovation in education.
We have now also many concepts and terminology.

And in this regard, we speak about mobile learning, ubiquitous learning, smart learning, BYOD, bring your own technology, building your own devices, learning analytics, open educational resources, books, and so on.
So accordingly, Alex Rose ICT in education has defined it.
It's a scope of work, aspiring to contribute in the spread of these emerging innovations in the Arab region.

At a larger scale and educational institutions in Arabic, ducation institutions taking into account the primary key factors of access, equity and quality.
